00012 mlong mt[N]; /* the array for the state vector  */
00013 mint mti = N + 1; /* mti==N+1 means mt[N] is not initialized */

00021                         myInts->a[i] = (maven::Object*) new intArray(10);

00025         mboolean initMaven() {
00026                 // push current thread
00027                 // bug #25: to do with pthread_self()
00028                 
00029                 // init random number algorithm
00030                 mt[0] = time(NULL) & 0xffffffffUL;
00031                 
00032                 for(mti = 1; mti < N; mti++) {
00033                         mt[mti] = (1812433253UL * (mt[mti-1] ^ (mt[mti-1] >> 30)) + mti); 
00034                         /* See Knuth TAOCP Vol2. 3rd Ed. P.106 for multiplier. */
00035                         /* In the previous versions, MSBs of the seed affect   */
00036                         /* only MSBs of the array mt[].                        */
00037                         /* 2002/01/09 modified by Makoto Matsumoto             */
00038                         mt[mti] &= 0xffffffffUL;
00039                         /* for >32 bit machines */
00040                 }
00041                 
00042                 // now for the data type min/max
00043                 float* float_val = new float;
00044                 *((int*) float_val) = 0x7f800000;
00045                 maven::Float$static::POSITIVE_INFINITY = *float_val;
00046                 *((int*) float_val) = 0xff800000;
00047                 maven::Float$static::NEGATIVE_INFINITY = *float_val;
00048                 *((int*) float_val) = 0x7f7fffff;
00049                 maven::Float$static::MAX_VALUE = *float_val;
00050                 *((int*) float_val) = 0x1;
00051                 maven::Float$static::MIN_VALUE = *float_val;
00052                 *((int*) float_val) = 0x7fc00000;
00053                 maven::Float$static::NaN = *float_val;
00054                 
00055                 double* double_val = new double;
00056                 *((long long*) double_val) = 0x7ff0000000000000LL;
00057                 maven::Double$static::POSITIVE_INFINITY = *double_val;
00058                 *((long long*) double_val) = 0xfff0000000000000LL;
00059                 maven::Double$static::NEGATIVE_INFINITY = *double_val;
00060                 *((long long*) double_val) = 0x7fefffffffffffffLL;
00061                 maven::Double$static::MAX_VALUE = *double_val;
00062                 *((long long*) double_val) = 0x1L;
00063                 maven::Double$static::MIN_VALUE = *double_val;
00064                 *((long long*) double_val) = 0x7ff8000000000000LL;
00065                 maven::Double$static::NaN = *double_val;
00066                 
00067                 return true;
00068         }
00069
